Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.controller.Controller
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") @RestController public class Controller extends Object
The Controller class serves as a RESTful API for managing delivery planning and map operations within the application. It handles various tasks related to courier management, map loading, delivery requests, and computation of delivery tours.

This controller provides endpoints for operations such as updating the number of couriers, loading maps and delivery requests from files, computing delivery tours, managing delivery points, defining warehouse locations, and generating reports. It also supports undo and redo functionalities for delivery request modifications.

The class is annotated with @RestController to define RESTful endpoints and @CrossOrigin to allow cross-origin requests from the React frontend running on http://localhost:3000.

The controller interacts with the Plan and Round classes to manage the map and delivery round data respectively. It utilizes the Command design pattern through the CommandManager to enable undo and redo operations.

Since:
2024-04-27

  • Method Details

    • updateCouriers

      @PostMapping("/couriers") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updateCouriers(@RequestBody Map<String,Integer> payload)
      Updates the number of available couriers.
      Parameters:
      payload - A Map containing the new courier count with key "count".
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Void> with HTTP 200 OK if successful.

    • getCouriers

      @GetMapping("/Couriers") public String getCouriers()
      Retrieves information about available couriers.
      Returns:
      A String containing courier information.

    • loadMap

      @PostMapping("/loadMap") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> loadMap(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Loads a map from an XML file and initializes the delivery round. Resets any existing map data before loading the new map.
      Parameters:
      file - MultipartFile containing the XML map data.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map<String, String>> with a success or error message.

    • loadDelivery

      @PostMapping("/loadDelivery") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> loadDelivery(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Loads delivery requests from a file and associates them with the current round.
      Parameters:
      file - MultipartFile containing delivery request data.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map<String, Object>> containing delivery requests, warehouse location, and status message.

    • displayMap

      @GetMapping("/map") public Map<String,Object> displayMap()
      Retrieves the current map data including intersections and sections. Returns detailed information about each section including origin and destination intersections, length, and street name.
      Returns:
      A Map containing lists of intersections and detailed section information.

    • computeTours

      @PostMapping("/compute") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> computeTours()
      Computes delivery tours based on current delivery requests and courier availability.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map<String, Object>> indicating the status of tour computation and containing the computed tours.

    • getTours

      @GetMapping("/tours") public String getTours()
      Retrieves computed delivery tours.
      Returns:
      A String containing tour information.

    • deleteDeliveryRequest

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteDeliveryRequest") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> deleteDeliveryRequest(@RequestBody String deliveryRequestId)
      Deletes a delivery request from the system.
      Parameters:
      deliveryRequestId - The ID of the delivery request to be deleted.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map<String, String>> confirmation message with the deleted request ID.

    • deleteDeliveryRequestWithCourier

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteDeliveryRequestWithCourier") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> deleteDeliveryRequestWithCourier(@RequestBody Map<String,String> request)
      Deletes a delivery request from the system and updates the corresponding courier's tour.
      Parameters:
      request - A Map containing "deliveryId" to be deleted and "courierId" to update the tour.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map> confirmation message with the deleted request ID and updated tours, or an error message if the operation fails.

    • addDeliveryPoint

      @PostMapping("/addDeliveryPointById") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> addDeliveryPoint(@RequestBody Map<String,String> request)
      Adds a delivery request to the system.
      Parameters:
      request - A Map containing the "intersectionId" of the selected intersection.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map> confirmation of the action with the added delivery request and current delivery count, or an error message if the operation fails.

    • defineWarehouse

      @PostMapping("/defineWarehouseById") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> defineWarehouse(@RequestBody Map<String,String> request)
      Defines a warehouse location based on an intersection ID.
      Parameters:
      request - A Map containing the "intersectionId" to define as the warehouse.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map> with a success or error message and warehouse details.

    • addDeliveryPointAfterCompute

      @PostMapping("/addDeliveryPointByIdAfterCompute") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> addDeliveryPointAfterCompute(@RequestBody Map<String,String> request)
      Adds a delivery point after the computation of delivery tours.
      Parameters:
      request - A Map containing the "intersectionId" and "courierID" for the delivery point.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map> containing the status and updated delivery tours, or an error message if the operation fails.

    • undo

      @PostMapping("/undo") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> undo()
      Performs an undo operation on the last executed command.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map> containing the updated delivery requests and tours after the undo operation, or an error message if the operation fails.

    • redo

      @PostMapping("/redo") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> redo()
      Performs a redo operation on the last undone command.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Map> containing the updated delivery requests and tours after the redo operation, or an error message if the operation fails.

    • resetCommands

      @PostMapping("/resetCommands") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> resetCommands()
      Resets the command stack, clearing all executed and undone commands.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<Void> with HTTP 200 OK if successful.

    • downloadReport

      @GetMapping("/downloadReport") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<byte[]> downloadReport()
      Generates and downloads a report of the current delivery tours.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<byte[]> containing the generated report file, or an error response if the operation fails.
